sunder.title: Sunder - Item Breakage System
sunder.settings.testingMode.name: Testing Mode
sunder.settings.testingMode.hint: Enable verbose console logging for debugging.
sunder.settings.breakageThreshold.name: Weapon Breakage Threshold
sunder.settings.breakageThreshold.hint: The raw d20 roll value that the attacker rolls to trigger a chance that their weapon breaks on low rolls (e.g., 1)
sunder.settings.criticalBreakageThreshol: The raw d20 roll value that the attacker rolls to trigger a chance that the defender's armor breaks on high rolls (e.g., 20)
sunder.settings.breakageDC.name: Breakage DC
sunder.settings.breakageDC.hint: The DC players must roll to avoid breakage
sunder.settings.durabilityByRarity.name: Durability by Rarity
sunder.settings.durabilityByRarity.hint: Click the button to configure durability values for each rarity. Default values are 1,2,3,4,5.
sunder.settings.twoStageBreakage.name: Two-Stage Breakage
sunder.settings.twoStageBreakage.hint: If enabled, items become Damaged on first failure, Broken on second. If disabled, items break on first failure.
sunder.settings.weaponAttackPenalty.name: Weapon Attack Penalty
sunder.settings.weaponAttackPenalty.hint: Attack roll penalty for damaged weapons (doubled when broken)
sunder.settings.armorACPenalty.name: Armor AC Penalty (Optional)
sunder.settings.armorACPenalty.hint: Disabled when dynamic penalties are enabled. This setting is a fallback for the dynamic AC penalty calculation. Manually set the static AC reduction for damaged armor (doubled when broken).
sunder.settings.enableDynamicACPenalties: If enabled, AC penalties for damaged or broken armor and shields are calculated based on their protective value instead of a static value.
sunder.notify.dynamicACSwitch: Switching dynamic AC penalties may require updating existing Sunder Active Effects on armor and shields. Please review and update effects manually.
sunder.settings.heavyWeaponBonus.name: Heavy Weapon Breakage Bonus
sunder.settings.heavyWeaponBonus.hint: Bonus added to breakage rolls for critical hits with Heavy weapons
sunder.settings.repairCostPercentage.hin: Percentage of base price to charge for repairing damaged items (doubled for broken items)
sunder.settings.breakageSound.name: Breakage Popup Sound
sunder.settings.breakageSound.hint: Sound played when the breakage popup opens. Leave blank to disable.
sunder.settings.breakagePassSound.name: Breakage Pass Sound
sunder.settings.breakagePassSound.hint: Sound played when an item resists breaking (roll succeeds). Leave blank to disable.
sunder.settings.breakageFailSound.name: Breakage Fail Sound
sunder.settings.breakageFailSound.hint: Sound played when an item damages or breaks (roll fails). Leave blank to disable.
sunder.settings.repairSound.name: Repair Sound
sunder.settings.repairSound.hint: Sound played when an item is repaired. Leave blank to disable.
sunder.popup.title: Item Breakage Check
sunder.settings.enableWeaponBreakage.hin: If enabled, weapons can break on low attack rolls.
sunder.settings.enableArmorBreakage.name: Enable Armor Breakage
sunder.settings.enableArmorBreakage.hint: If enabled, armor and shields can break on critical hits.
sunder.notify.noGold: {actor} does not have enough gold to repair {item} ({cost}gp required)!
